name: Mellelok Descension
description:
This project was a debut present for VTuber Fuura Yuri, which was streamed on November 29th, 2022.

SYNOPSIS

Mellelok City... that sight of that city from atop the mountain has enamored Yuri for all her life. Fed up with being stuck in her cabin, she ventures outside to finally escape the mountain, unknowing of the treacherous journey ahead of her.

STAFF

This visual novel was co-created by Kamigigana & Brimbel.

  • Director/Scenario/Art/GUI: Kamigigana
  • Programming/Additional Writing/Assistant Artist/Sound Design/GUI: Brimbel
  • Additional Art: Aiyuu (Wolves, Teru), Dr4 (Airi)
  • Proofreading: Chris

CONTENT NOTICES

  • Blood and Gore
  • Profanity
